definition: to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
Ambush from Ten Sides (pipa solo piece)/House of Flying Daggers (2004 movie by Zhang Yimou 張藝謀|张艺谋[Zhang1 Yi4 mou2])
to lie in wait/to ambush/to conceal sth

sentences.english: A rebel force was beguiled into ambush.
sentences.chinese: 一支叛軍受誘騙中了埋伏。

sentences.english: And Saul came to the city of Amalek and lay in wait in the valley.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅到了亞瑪力的京城，在谷中設下埋伏。

sentences.english: Ambush fir in ci to see huang feng, etc.
sentences.chinese: 埋伏在亂石堆裏杉木看見黃鳴鋒等人。

sentences.english: And Apollonius left privately in the camp a thousand horsemen behind them.
sentences.chinese: 阿頗羅尼曾留下一千騎兵，在他們背後埋伏。

sentences.english: And in prison in an ambush waiting for a sure catch.
sentences.chinese: 並在監獄裏設下埋伏等待甕中捉鱉。

sentences.english: And there were liers in wait abiding in the chamber.
sentences.chinese: 有人預先埋伏在內室裏。

sentences.english: She lies in wait like a robber and increases the number of the faithless.
sentences.chinese: 她埋伏好像強盜，她使人中多有奸詐的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the nursing experience of guide-erupt operation of maxillary embedded tooth.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討上頜埋伏牙開窗導萌術的護理經驗。

sentences.english: The robbers were lying in wait for the rich traveller.
sentences.chinese: 強盜們埋伏起來準備襲擊那個有錢的旅客。

sentences.english: I'm not going to have you ambushing me, either physically or verbally.
sentences.chinese: 我將沒有你埋伏突襲我，也身體上地或口述地。

sentences.english: That can be useful in group ambushes or surprise attacks.
sentences.chinese: 在埋伏和奇襲的時候隱身是很有用的。

sentences.english: If we go in after them, they can ambush us easily.
sentences.chinese: 只要我們跟進去，他們就能輕易地打我們一個埋伏。

sentences.english: He was a specialist in ambushes, he said, and explained his tactics.
sentences.chinese: 他說自己是埋伏戰鬥方面的專家，並講述了他的戰術。

sentences.english: We used strategy to seduce the enemy into attacking the small town that we had ambushed.
sentences.chinese: 我軍用計誘使敵人攻打我們佈置了埋伏的小鎮。

sentences.english: Skirmishes and ambushes raged across the mountains and forests of Connacht.
sentences.chinese: 激烈衝突和埋伏在山巒和康諾特森林。

sentences.english: Clinical analysis of the orthodontic treatment of impacted teeth;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討上頜埋伏牙開窗導萌術的護理經驗。

definition: to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to provide support/to come to the rescue
to stop/to obstruct/to bar the way
